Module: npc_ai

npc_ai

Non-player character add-on. Provides animated moves for NPC with a specified behavior.
Source:
  • addons/npc_ai.js, line 3

Methods

(static) disable_animation()

Removes all sensors attached to animated objects and stops animation
Source:
  • addons/npc_ai.js, line 342

(static) enable_animation()

Attaches sensors to characters and runs elapsed_cb every frame.
Source:
  • addons/npc_ai.js, line 317

(static) npc_ai(graph, graph.path, graph.delay, graph.actions, graph.obj, graph.collider, graph.empty, graph.speed, graph.random, graph.type, graph.rot_speed)

Creates a new event track based on a given graph.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
graph Object Animation graph with a number of movement params.
Properties
Name Type Description
path Array A path which the NPC will be moving around.
delay Number Time delay before each path step.
actions Object Actions for every movement type (move, idle, etc).
obj Object Animated object ID.
collider Object Collider object ID which will be used for collision detection.
empty Object The corresponding empty object.
speed Number Movement speed.
random Boolean Determines whether the object will perform random moves or not.
type Number NPC movement type (NT_WALKING, NT_FLYING, etc).
rot_speed Number Rotation speed.
Source:
  • addons/npc_ai.js, line 50
